    • Uses of MessagingException in fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.exception

      Subclasses of MessagingException in fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConnectionFailedException
      Specialized exception that indicates that the session couldn't be bound (connection failed).
      class  DataCodingException
      Ogham tries to determine the value of the Data Coding Scheme according to the message.
      class  GuessEncodingException
      Ogham tries to guess the encoding of the Sms.
      class  KeepAliveException
      In order to avoid creating a new session for each message to send, Ogha provides different strategies to handle the sessions.
      class  MessagePreparationException
      The Sms message has to be converted to a SubmitSm PDU in order to be sent by Cloudhopper.
      class  SessionException
      This exception indicates that the failure is due to the handling of the session itself and not raised while sending the SMS.
      class  SmppException
      Exception that is thrown when an error due to the SMPP protocol is raised (either while trying to send a SMS or while connecting to the SMSC server or anything else).
      class  UnsupportedCharsetException
      Specific exception that is thrown when the encoding of the message has no valid Data Coding Scheme value that can be handled by the SMSC.

    • Uses of MessagingException in fr.sii.ogham.template.exception

      Subclasses of MessagingException in fr.sii.ogham.template.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NoResolverAdapterException
      Ogham provides ResourceResolvers to resolve a resource from a ResourcePath.
      class  ResolverAdapterConfigurationException
      Ogham provides ResourceResolvers to resolve a resource from a ResourcePath.
      class  ResolverAdapterException
      Ogham provides ResourceResolvers to resolve a resource from a ResourcePath.
      class  TemplateVariantNotFoundException
      Specialized exception that is thrown when the variant can be handled by Ogham through a VariantResolver but the ResolvedPath provided by the VariantResolver points to an non-existing template.
      class  UnknownVariantException
      Specialized exception that indicates that the message references a variant that is not known by Ogham.
      class  VariantResolutionException
      When a ResourcePath references a template, the path may be partial to be able to load a template that has variants.
